def Load(widget): from System.Web import HttpContext from System.Web import HttpRequest from System.Web import HttpResponse from Benner.Tecnologia.Common.Exceptions import CancelledOperationException from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityBase from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityAssociation
handle = HttpContext.Current.Session["HANDLEACAO"]
if (handle is None): HttpContext.Current.Response.Redirect("~/PortalCRM/a/CRM_ACOESRELACIONAMENTO/Grid.aspx")
entity = widget.Entity if (not entity is None): entity.Fields["ACAORELACIONAMENTO"].Handle = handle
